title: [PATCH] Auto-deploy script for polly bot fixed
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.headline: Polly's flight path cleared
gist.blurb: Smoothed out the runway for our favorite bot. Deployment scripts are now logging better and flying straighter.
gist.summary: Updated the Polly bot deployment workflow to improve logging, fix directory paths, and standardize pip commands.
gist.impact: Ensures reliable and automated updates for the Polly Discord bot without manual intervention.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot wearing a tiny construction hard hat, adjusting a pixelated conveyor belt or pipeline that is launching a small robot (Polly). Represents the fix to the deployment pipeline.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot wearing a tiny hard hat, inspecting a conveyor belt with a small robot. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Pixel text 'DEPLOY'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
